content: I think you are confusing UI with UX and interaction design. Product ideas, features or behaviours can be easily copied and become common — and even best practices. That is mainly UX and interaction design. UI design on the other hand is part of an app’s brand and can’t be copied. For example, with Snapchat stories Facebook — first on Instagram and later on Facebook and Whatsapp — copied the feature and how it works, the concept and interaction model. But didn’t copy Snapchat’s UI.
